text: José Serrano Salgado (born 19 November 1970) "Curriculum Vitae" , Ministry of the Interior, Ecuador is an Ecuadorian politician. He was President of the National Assembly between 14 May 2017 and 9 March 2018. He was Minister of the Interior from 13 May 2011 to 15 November 2016. Serrano ran as a pre-candidate for the Democratic Center nomination for President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the National Assembly of Ecuador Category:People from Cuenca, Ecuador
title: José Serrano Salgado
